posts.title: Squash Pushed Commits into One Single Commit
posts.excerpt: If you have recently worked on a huge project, you'd find yourself having committed too many tiny commits, just to be safe with the very many changes you are making, whether while vibe coding or not.

posts.title: The Brutal Reality of Vibe Coding for Software Engineers
posts.excerpt: AI doesn't replace expertise. It amplifies it. If you don't know what good code looks like, AI will help you ship garbage faster.
